article.subtitle: Just a few more days left for submissions.
article.title: CHRISTMAS HAIKU COMPETITION UPDATE
article.description: Just a few more days left for submissions.
article.body_html:
Subscribe now

We have 43 submissions so far. I asked ChatGPT to do a word analysis.

Unsurprisingly, gold , Japan and bearish terms (winter, cold etc) dominate. Feel free to submit more than one entry. I will announce a winner on Monday next week.

Subscribe now
article.truncated_body_text: We have 43 submissions so far. I asked ChatGPT to do a word analysis.

publishedBylines.name: Russell Clark
publishedBylines.bio: 20 years in the markets, specialising in hedge funds, macro and short selling. Taking a break to write newsletters instead.

publication.name: Capital Flows and Asset Markets
publication.hero_text: Hedge funds, macro and short selling.

publication.name: Jarrett Clark - Motorsport Dreams
publication.hero_text: Jarrett Clark is a 15 year old British Australian racing driver living in North West London, UK.  He has had a passion for motorsport since he was three years old. He began karting when he was 8 years old and will be racing in FIA British F4 in 2026.

comments.body:
Brumby kicks the fence
Stock market yells "Whoa there, mate!"
Both crash through the gate
comments.name: knutsel

comments.body:
Cold winds start to blow,

Currency Yields Inflation,

Rock and a hard place.
comments.name: ES

comments.body:
Like a river branch
The money path becomes two
One in Metal, One Chained
comments.name: Rajiv

children.body: very nice - a nice use of nature

content.text: very nice - a nice use of nature

children.name: Russell Clark

children.body: thanks. last line should be "One Metal, One Chained" to get 5-7-5 (i think originally i had "one in gold"). kept going back and forth between "money" and "reserve" for the second line.

content.text: thanks. last line should be "One Metal, One Chained" to get 5-7-5 (i think originally i had "one in gold"). kept going back and forth between "money" and "reserve" for the second line.

children.name: Rajiv

comments.body:
Christ child lights the way
zephyr soughs, resolute pine
stocking blooms black coal
comments.name: Based Money

transcript: [00:00:00.509] SPEAKER_00: Hi guys, Russell here. Just a quick update on the Christmas Haiku competition. Just a few more days left for submissions. I think I'm going to choose a winner on Monday. And we've had 43 submissions so far, which is quite a lot. Pleasantly surprised. So I asked ChatGPT to do a word analysis. Gold is one of the most common, so is winter in markets. Cold, frost, and snow. So unsurprisingly, there is a gold in Japan. you know, reflect largely in these haikus, as do, well, I would consider bearish terms like winter and cold and frost, for example, which I think is interesting. If you want to do another submission, perhaps on themes that are different to this, feel free, and you're more than welcome to have more than one submission per person. I will announce a winner on Monday, so in a few days' time. All right, stay safe. We'll talk again soon. Ciao.
